title: One Of Netflix’s Most Popular Shows Is Coming Back
description:
Netflix has carried a number of popular programs over the years. Now one of Netflix’s most popular shows is coming back for a new season. As shared by Variety, Netflix’s Black Mirror is coming back for a seventh season. This is exciting news, especially as the show’s most recent season only premiered this year after [...]

The post One Of Netflix’s Most Popular Shows Is Coming Back appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Jenna Ortega Leaves ‘Scream 7’ Following Melissa Barrera Firing
description:
Scream fans were devastated to learn that Melissa Barrera was fired from Scream VII. Now, just one day later, it’s been revealed that co-star Jenna Ortega has left Scream 7 herself. Both Melissa Barrera and Jenna Ortega were major players in the latest Scream revival. The 2022 movie essentially passed the torch from the saga’s [...]

The post Jenna Ortega Leaves ‘Scream 7’ Following Melissa Barrera Firing appeared first on ScreenGeek.
